articles.title: 4 killed in shooting at Indiana mall, 2 injured, police say
articles.description: The gunman, an adult male, was armed with a “long gun” and appears to have acted alone, police said. He was fatally shot by a “good Samaritan,” officials said.
articles.content:

A gunman shot and killed three people and injured two others at a mall in Indiana on Sunday evening before he was fatally shot by a bystander, officials said.
